name: Pico's School: Remake
summary: Pico is a lovely character Tom Fulp of Newgrounds.com created ages ago. A few years ago he had a contest where the goal was to create a game based on the Pico universe. I choose to remake the original Pico game called 'Picos School'. This is the result!
info:
